overview: Sami St. Claire is having a bit of a problem with her roommate Delilah Davis. She stays out too late and doesn't help out with straightening up their new place. Besides Sami wonders why Delilah always walks around topless, which is turning her on. Sadie Holmes and Tara Morgan are best friends. Tara explains she's getting nowhere with all these guys she's been dating and Sadie clears things up and makes her feel a whole lot better. Sabrina Banks is so turned on by the way Sabrina Banks looks as she's sunbathing by the pool that she begins to play with herself. Tara invites Ember Stone and Catie Parker over. When they arrive they see her masturbating, so what are friends for? They join in.
title: Best Friends 3
